data.eml:eml: Rivierenland Water Board maintains 201,000 ha between 3 large rivers, the Lek, the Bergsche Maas, and the eastern part of the Waal. The area stretches from the Biesbosch to Nijmegen, and has been shaped by flooding across the years.Positive observations without protocolDataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl250,780 records (March 2018)
